title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Personalized Language Learning Design in Islamic Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform three or more PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects applying Islamic pedagogical principles (e.g., tarbiya, iqtisaad) to demonstrate the ability to establish personal learning plans.

Learners can analyze three Arabic scripture texts, create a learning portfolio (2,000+ characters text analysis report, three concrete practice plans, weekly reflection journal) reflecting knowledge internalization principles (physical/mental practice), and achieve "excellent" ratings in â‰¥4 out of 5 rubric items.
Learners can develop instructor-learner relationship-building strategies by exchanging individualized feedback (five or more instances) through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
